casebody.data:
ROSENSTOCK et al., Appellants, v. MONTAGUE, Respondent. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

May 26, 1899.) Action by Samuel Rosenstock and others against Clara Montague. From an order in favor of defendant entered on a verdict directed by the court, plaintiffs appeal. Affirmed. Abner C. Thomas, for appellants. Robert L. Redfield, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment appealed from affirmed, with costs.
